LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_InsectoidHerder.label: insectoid herder
LanguageData.VME_IdeoRole_InsectoidHerder.description: A talented tamer of insectoids. Through study or natural talent these leaders are capable of immediately understanding and controlling insectoid creatures, however, as a sacred bond they are not allowed to partake in any other kinds of work. Insectoid herders can erect insectoid hives as part of a short ritual.
